title: Number of road deaths in Switzerland 2006 to 2018
summary: In general Number of fatalities has stayed the same over the Year.
Number of fatalities is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum Number of fatalities, about 230.0 was reported at Year 2017
Minimum Number of fatalities about 216.0 was reached at Year 2016
min_summary: In general Number of fatalities has stayed the same over the Year.
Number of fatalities is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017.
mid_summary: In general Number of fatalities has stayed the same over the Year.
Number of fatalities is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum Number of fatalities, about 230.0 was reported at Year 2017
Minimum Number of fatalities about 216.0 was reached at Year 2016
max_summary: Overall Number of fatalities has increased over the Year.
Number of fatalities is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
